kDesc
Wear it with pride, this epic sword has certainly seen straight through you![#Legal]
Portez-la avec fierté, cette épée de légende a su vous percer à jour ![#Legal]
Trage es mit Stolz. Dieses epische Schwert hat dich sicher schon durchschaut.[#Legal]
Cammina fiero ed orgoglioso con questa spada conficcata nel tuo torace![#Legal]
¡Llévala con orgullo, esta épica espada te atravesará![#Legal]
堂々と着けましょう。この素晴らしい剣は貴方を見抜いています。[#Legal]
당당하게 검을 착용하세요. 이 웅장한 검은 당신을 정확히 꿰뚫었습니다! [#Legal]
Wear it with pride, this epic sword has certainly seen straight through you![#Legal]
自豪地穿上它吧，你看起來就被古老的刺刀給穿透了！[#Legal]
自豪地穿上它吧，你看起來就被古老的刺刀給穿透了！[#Legal]
Wear it with pride, this epic sword has certainly seen straight through you![#Legal]
